entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
